description: Defines the mandatory contents of the Recovery Snapshot & Chain-of-Custody Manifest (RSCM) required by RRP V2.0 for RT-2 rollbacks. This ensures all critical state data ($\Omega_{Failure}$) is consistently gathered and attested by CRoT.

fields.name: metadata_capture_timestamp
fields.notes: Exact timestamp of resource fencing initiation and state capture.

fields.name: gsep_execution_trace
fields.notes: Full, delimited execution trace stack leading to the failure trigger.

fields.name: volatile_memory_dump_uri
fields.notes: Secure, encrypted location of the memory snapshot relevant to the GICM focus.

fields.name: environment_variables_snapshot
fields.notes: Snapshot of all active configuration and environment settings (non-secret).

fields.name: rscm_package_checksum
fields.notes: Cryptographic hash of the compiled RSCM data package before CRoT signing.

fields.name: cr_integrity_signature
fields.notes: CRoT signature certifying the integrity and authenticity of this RSCM record.

fields.name: failure_context_uuid
fields.notes: Cross-reference UUID linking this RSCM instance to the originating VRRM entry.
